review_blob: Youll need your "big boy" pants on to drink this insanely hoppy brew.  The first sign of its major league taste is the color - the deep orange honey texture will literally block out the sun.  The drinking experience is unique and its best enjoyed in small increments.
Subtle carmel and nutty aroma.  The color is a murky light honey.  The taste was dry, less hoppy than expected and it quickly dissipated.
Wonderful dark carmel aroma with droplets of fruit, flower, and herbs.  Complex aroma continues to the very end of this bold and refreshing IPA.
Great smokey taste with hearty edge.  Very enjoyable with a Lebanon bologna and swiss cheese sandwich.
Great aroma and taste.  Initial bitterness is refreshing and the beer holds its flavor to the bottom of the glass.
